import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { NavLink, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import EditProfileModal from '../modals/EditProfileModal'; import ResetPasswordModal from '../modals/ResetPasswordModal'; import { showModal , showResetModal } from '../../modalStore/modalActions'; import { logout } from '../../utils/checkToken'; function Header({ isModalOpen, showModal ,isResetModalOpen,currentUser,showResetModal,dispatch}) { let [currentUserLocal, setCurrentUserLocal] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { setCurrentUserLocal(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('currentUser'))) }, []) let user = typeof currentUser == "string" ? JSON.parse(currentUser) : currentUserLocal; return (
  • Hello {user.f_name +' '+ user.l_name}

) } export default Header;
